Key Match Events: Luka Doncic had 28 points and 10 rebounds, Klay Thompson added 22 points in his Dallas debut and the Mavericks beat the San Antonio Spurs 120-109 in the opener for both teams Thursday night.
Doncic scores 28, Thompson adds 22 in Dallas debut as Mavs top Spurs 120-109
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson makes a splash in Mavs debut with 6 treys
Luka knows this Klay 3 is money before he shoots it
CP3 dimes Wemby on alley-oop slam for Spurs
Wemby connects with deep trey from beyond the arc
Others: Referees: Josh Tiven, Jason Goldenberg, Rodney Mott
